title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama; sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers fluent builders, streaming, and embedding support for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, and manage models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models; supports markdown, code blocks, and themes.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Community TypeScript wrapper around Ollama REST API with Zod schemas and auto-generated types.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ with async streaming and chat abstractions.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerised with one-liner commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC, and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + LangChain + Chroma; ingest PDFs and query locally in seconds.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel with slash commands and role-based access.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into Slack threads with mentions, threads, and code formatting.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; idiomatic Go API with streaming, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated library of 100+ ready-to-run GGUF models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) maintained by Ollama.
